episodes.title: Morgan vs. Luffy! Who's This Beautiful Young Girl?
episodes.plot: Luffy convinces Zoro to join her crew, but they must defeat Captain Morgan first. Meanwhile, Koby is accepted as a marine.

episodes.title: Dasshutsu Naru ka!? Ugokihajimeta Kami no Shiren!
episodes.plot: While the crew is preparing to leave Skypeia, Luffy, Ussop and Sanji go back to Pagaya's house seeking food and materials. The ship is trapped by a giant crab, and carried to the Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Lovely-doori no Wana! Zennounaru God Enel
episodes.plot: Conis reveals her true intentions and Enel unleash his rage. Luffy, Sanji and Usopp sail towards the Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Susume Karasumaru! Ikenie no Saidan o Mezase
episodes.plot: Luffy, Sanji and Usopp sail along the Milky Road and face different kinds of traps. The rest of the crew is caught at the Sacrificial Altar, where Chopper repairs the Going Merry while Robin, Zoro and Nami go into the sacred jungle.

episodes.title: Seizonritsu 10%! Mantra-tsukai no Shinkan Satori!
episodes.plot: Luffy, Sanji and Usopp meet Priest Satori and his balls. The crow boat is lost and the crew must defeat Satori and find the boat before is too late.

episodes.title: "Tama no Shiren" no Kyoui! Mayoi no Mori no Shitou
episodes.plot: Robin finds a trail hidden under the moss, while one of the Sacred Priests visits Chopper at the Altar. The fight against Satori continues.

episodes.title: Chopper Ayaushi! Motokami Tai Shinkan Shura
episodes.plot: Gan Fall arrives to rescue Chopper from evil Priest Shura. Robin finds a pit within some ruins. Satori prepares a great surprise for Luffy.

episodes.title: Makafushigi! Himo no Shiren to Koi no Shiren!?
episodes.plot: Luffy and Sanji manages to defeat Satori. Meanwhile, Gan Fall is defeated and falls to the water. Even though he knows he can't swim, Chopper jumps into the water to save him.

episodes.title: Shandra no Hi o Tomose! Senshi Wiper
episodes.plot: Chopper and Gan Fall are saved by the Southbirds, and they tell Chopper that Gan Fall is actually the God of Skypiea. Meanwhile, Nami, Zoro and Robin find out the truth why Upper Yard is a soil island.

episodes.title: Tenkuu no Ougonkyou Jaya! Mezase Kami no Yashiro!
episodes.plot: The Shandians, lead by Wyper, begins to attack the Upper Yard. After knowing the truth about the island and being reunited, Straw Hat crew decide to search for the gold on the island.

episodes.title: Ougon Zen'yasai! "Vearth" e no Omoi!
episodes.plot: Straw Hat Crew sets a camp at the Upper Yard and discusses the plan for retrieving the gold. Gan Fall who is taken care of by Chopper finally wakes up and tells them all the history of Upper Yard.

episodes.title: God Enel Toujou!! Ikinokori e no Aubade
episodes.plot: God Enel shows himself in front of his priests, foreseeing the incoming war between Shandia, priests, and pirates from Blue Sea (a.k.a Straw Hat crew) at the Upper Yard.

episodes.title: Ma no Umi Totsunyuu! Kiri ni Ukabu Nazo no Gaikotsu
episodes.plot: The crew is surrounded by a dense fog and they meet skeleton Brook, who tells them his sad story.

episodes.title: Hito ni Aeta Yorokobi! Gaikotsu Shinshi no Shoutai
episodes.plot: Onboard the Thousand Sunny, Brook tells his story of being a musician before being killed. However, his spirit was able to reanimate his skeleton due to the power of the Yomi Yomi no Mi.

episodes.title: Kai Genshou Zokuzoku! Thriller Bark Jouriku
episodes.plot: After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!

episodes.title: Tensai to Yobareta Otoko! Hogback Arawaru!
episodes.plot: Chopper, Nami, and Usopp get scared out of their minds when they encounter a graveyard full of zombies! Meanwhile, the rest of the crew gets trapped in super creepy sea web!

episodes.title: Nami Dai Pinch! Zombie Yashiki to Toumei Ningen
episodes.plot: Nami, Usopp and Chopper meet Dr Hogback and they spend a crazy night in his castle. The rest of the crew is crossing the forest in order to rescue them.

episodes.title: Zombie no Nazo! Akumu no Hogback Kenkyuujo
episodes.plot: Escaping from the Surprise Zombies of the mansion, Nami, Chopper and Usopp discover the truth about Cindry's identity and Dr. Hogback's experiments before being approached by a mysterious samurai zombie with Brook's voice.

episodes.title: Sono Na wa Moriah! Kage o Nigiru Dai Kaizoku no Wana
episodes.plot: After beating the zombies, the Straw Hat Pirates learn that one of the Shichibukai, Gekko Moriah, has been stealing people's shadows and using them to revive zombies.

episodes.title: Zombie Song no Kyouen! Youchi no Kane wa Yami no Oto
episodes.plot: Usopp, Chopper, and Nami get trapped in a coffin after being slashed by a zombie samurai. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats make short work of some haunted paintings!

episodes.title: Doubutsu Ippai? Perona no Wonder Garden
episodes.plot: After awakening the General Zombies, Absalom is accosted by Lola, a zombie warthog obsessed with making him her husband. After learning that he's chosen Nami to be his bride, Lola sets her sights on the navigator.

episodes.title: Kieru Mugiwara Ichimi! Arawareta Nazo no Kenshi!
episodes.plot: The three remaining Straw Hats are lured by Buhichuck into a room where they are forced to face an army of armored General Zombies, but are able to handle them until the zombies are joined by a strange swordsman named Jigoro.

episodes.title: Nokoru Kishidou! Nami o Mamoru Uragiri Zombie
episodes.plot: A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge!

episodes.title: Sora kara Sanjou! Kenkyou Hanauta wa Ano Otoko!
episodes.plot: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!

episodes.title: Luffy Kinkyuujitai! Saikyou no Kage no Ikisaki
episodes.plot: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria's devious plan is revealed, and Luffy's escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can't live without!

episodes.title: Majin to Yobareta Senshi!! Oz Fukkatsu no Toki
episodes.plot: With Luffy's shadow, Moria and his followers head into the freezer holding his ultimate special zombie that he believes will help him gain power in the New World. At the same time Brook parts ways from Franky and Robin after giving further crucial advice regarding the zombies so he can go forth to defeat the zombie Ryuma and reclaiming his shadow from the samurai fencer.

episodes.title: 500-nenburi no Mezame!! Oars Kaigan!!
episodes.plot: Luffy's shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!

episodes.title: Shinnen no Inochigoi!! Afro o Mamoru Brook
episodes.plot: Brook confronts Ryuma, recalling his time on Thriller Bark five years prior - and his first battle with Ryuma and how he lost to a zombie with his own shadow.

episodes.title: Otoko no Chikai wa Shinazu!! Tooi Sora de Matsu Tomo e
episodes.plot: Usopp, Chopper, Robin, and Franky return to the Thousand Sunny, discovering their ship had been ransacked but Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji returned to them without their shadows.

episodes.title: Kanarazu Ai ni Iku!! Brook to Yakusoku no Misaki
episodes.plot: Luffy, Usopp, Sanji, and Zoro tell the rest of the crew how they got to meet Laboon as they started their new journey, while Brook reflects on his promise to return to Laboon amidst his duel with Ryuma.

episodes.title: Meshi to Nami to Kage!! Luffy Ikari no Daihangeki
episodes.plot: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!

episodes.title: Usopp Saikyou? Negative wa Makasetoke
episodes.plot: Luffy continues to take on Moriah while Chopper and Robin remain behind to take on Hogback and his loyal zombie servants.

episodes.title: General Zombie Shunsatsu!! Oars wa Bouken Kibun!!
episodes.plot: Usopp continues to stand up to Perona's Negative Hollows while wiping out Wild Zombies, while Brook is held at the mercy of Ryuma, who finally proves his superiority over the original by defeating the skeleton in battle before Zoro arrival.

episodes.title: Honoo no Knight Sanji!! Keritsubuse Itsuwari no Kyoshiki
episodes.plot: Luffy attempts to attack Gekko Moriah, but instead is forced to face his shadow clone: Doppelman, while Usopp continues to maneuver around the Wild Zombies to get to Perona only to now face Kumashi's wrath.

episodes.title: Suke Suke no Innen? Ubawareta Sanji no Yume
episodes.plot: Sanji finally gets to the chapel where Absalom is about to marry Nami, where he reveals his dreams. Usopp is still trying to catch the Ghost Princess, while Luffy can't get rid of Moria's shadow.

episodes.title: Tasukete Hero!? Teki wa Fujimi no Princess
episodes.plot: Usopp evades Kumashi and keeps chasing Perona, but she seems to be untouchable. Sogeking comes to help him and together they discover the Ghost Princess' weak point.

episodes.title: Perona Kyoufu!? Uso no U wa Usopp no U
episodes.plot: Usopp defeats Perona using his negativeness and his lies. Sanji and Luffy's zombies finally surrender to Moria. Battle between Zoro and Brook's zombie seems to be through.

episodes.title: Yane ni Mau Zangeki!! Kecchaku Zoro Tai Ryuuma
episodes.plot: Zoro defeats Ryuma and the former samurai gives him his sword. Oz is approaching while Luffy can not find a way to attack Moria.

episodes.title: Chopper Gekido!! Hogback Ma no Ijutsu
episodes.plot: Dr Hogback tells Chopper how he met Cindri. Chopper goes mad and bids Cindry to rebel against her zombie nature. Robin fools Hogback so he makes Sanji and Zoro's zombies fall from the tower. Luffy finally faces Oz.

episodes.title: Oz Hoeru!! Detekoi Mugiwara no Ichimi
episodes.plot: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!

episodes.title: Teki wa Luffy!! Saikyou Zombie Tai Mugiwara no Ichimi
episodes.plot: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!

episodes.title: Taorero Absalom!! Nami Yuujou no Raigeki!!
episodes.plot: Absalom is about to kiss Nami when she wakes up and suddenly Lola appears and pretends to fight Nami so she can escape. Absalom falls under Nami's lightning bolt while the rest of the straw hat crew is gathering to stop Oz.

episodes.title: Ubae Down!! Hissatsu Mugiwara Docking?
episodes.plot: In order to fight Oz, Franky summons the docking strategy, but Robin won't cooperate. The crew must find a way to take down Oz all together. Perona's zombies find an unknown Kuma man in the Sunny.

episodes.title: Ashioto Naki Shuurai!! Nazo no Boumonsha: Boukun Kuma
episodes.plot: Battle to knock down Oz continues and Luffy finally realizes he was pursuing Moria's shadow. Nami meets Kuma the tyrant.

episodes.title: Oars Plus Moriah: Chikara to Zunou no Saikyou Gattai
episodes.plot: Figth against Oz continues while Luffy is returning to the mansion yard. Kuma tells Moria about the new Shichibukai Blackbeard. Moria joins Oz and he demonstrate his intelligence. Brooks appears carrying salt.

episodes.title: Gyakuten e no Hisaku: Nightmare Luffy Kenzan
episodes.plot: Luffy is returning to the mansion when he is stopped by a group of shadowless survivors. The straw hat pirates are in trouble while Moria seems to be winning the battle. Nightmaere Luffy must come into action.

episodes.title: Kaimetsu, Mugiwara Ichimi: Kagekage no Chikara Zenkai
episodes.plot: The crew makes its best to defeat the Special Zombie but they are overpowered by his force. Chopper finds a weak point when he deduces how Oz died. Only Zoro, Chopper and Nami are still standing.

episodes.title: Chouzetsu Battle Start! Luffy vs Luffy
episodes.plot: 100-shabow man Nightmare Luffy appears to save Nami and Usopp from certain death. He has only 10 minutes to defeat both Oz and Moria or otherwise the shadows will leave him. Kuma watches the battle in silence.

episodes.title: Kecchaku Semaru! Tatakikome, Todome no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Oz stands up once again just to feel the power of the whole straw hat pirates. He is defeated and now the crew must face the power of 1000-shadow man Gecko Moria, while the sunrise is approaching.

episodes.title: Karada ga Kieru! Akumu no Shima ni Sasu Asahi!
episodes.plot: Luffy prepares his last attack against Moria and the shadows begin to abandon him. The first sun beams catch some pirates and the crew is running out of time. Final Gia Sado defeats Moria but it seems to be late.

episodes.title: Owaranai Kiki! Mugiwara Ichimi Massatsu Shirei
episodes.plot: All of Moriah's victims recover their shadows and celebrate regaining their ability to enter daylight.

episodes.title: Subete o Hajiku: Kuma no Nikyunikyu no Chikara
episodes.plot: Zoro attempts to fight Kuma, yet all of his attacks are effortlessly repelled. Kuma reveals that he has eaten the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi, which enables him to repel attacks and air at very high speed.

episodes.title: Nakama no Itami wa Waga Itami: Zoro Kesshi no Tatakai
episodes.plot: Zoro tries to stop Kuma from killing Luffy and Kuma offers Zoro a deal, he can take away Luffy's pain but he has to implant it in Zoro instead. Kuma tells him that he could die from all the pain but Zoro accept the offer without hesitation.

episodes.title: Tooi Hi no Yakusoku: Kaizoku no Uta to Chiisana Kujira
episodes.plot: Hogback and Absalom escape Thriller Bark with the unconscious Moriah, and reveal that Blackbeard gained his status as a Shichibukai by defeating Ace.

episodes.title: Brook no Kako: Youki na Nakama Kanashiki Wakare
episodes.plot: Brook recalls his past, when the whale Laboon started following his pirate ship and befriended the crew.

episodes.title: Binks no Sake: Kako to Genzai o Tsunagu Uta
episodes.plot: Brook continues to tell the tale of the Rumbar Pirates' fateful journey into the Grand Line, and the decision he made at the end of his original life.

episodes.title: Arata na Nakama! Ongakuka Hanauta no Brook
episodes.plot: Brook pledges himself to the Straw Hat Pirates, becoming their ninth member, as the crew settles their affairs at Thriller Bark and continue their journey.

episodes.title: Noronoro no Kyoui: Gingitsune no Foxy Futatabi
episodes.plot: The Straw Hat Pirates are taking a vacation at Spa Island, but there, they encounter Foxy and his crew, who are pursuing two small girls: Lina and her older sister, Sayo.

episodes.title: Otakara Daisoudatsusen! Houkai! Spa Island Gou
episodes.plot: In order to rescue Lina's sister, the crew destroys the Spa Island and look for the hot cross which is the clue to make the gems of Lina's father.
